newsitem.title: USA: First Industrial Realty portfolio grows.
newsitem.headline: First Industrial Realty portfolio grows.

text.p: First Industrial Realty Trust Inc said Wednesday its in-service portfolio grew 45 percent in 1996 through acquisitions and investments worth $267 million.

First Industrial said it added 112 properties to its portfolio last year with a total of 10.4 million square feet of space. The company added it has eight development and redevelopment projects under way in 1997.
First Industrial is a real estate company that owns and develops bulk warehouse and light industrial properties in 15 major U.S. markets.
Its shares were trading down 1/4 Wednesday at 29-3/4.
